text:
Created attachment 25609
Addes include guards in some headers.

Today I built xml-security-c from https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xml/security/trunk/c  (Rev. 955520) and I had problems with the resulting install.

Some of the headers lacked include-guards, I will attach a patch.
creator: andreas.neustifter@a-trust.at
